summary:
Makes iron sword look better!
Requires Jaysus Swords mod be installed.
Mods please read long description.
descriptionHtml:
Why did this get removed the first time I uploaded?
Quote from Jaysus Swords page
\"you may create plugins and mods based on this mod as long as your mod stays dependant on mine,
your mod may not contain any assets contained in my mod under any circumstances\"
That is what this is. A dependent esp that contains no assets of his mod.
Please don\'t remove this again.

Anyways on to the description.
This makes the vanilla iron sword look like the fine iron sword
from Jaysus Swords. I was tired of how ugly and stupid the original iron sword
looked so I did this in like 2 minutes.
Requires Jaysus Swords mod.
All credit goes to Jaysus for making the mesh and texture. (which is not included!)
author: L0M3N
